summary_and_description:
Keyboard shortcut failure in bookmarks window

Issue:
The Cmd/Ctrl+N shortcut fails to open new browser windows when the bookmarks window is focused, despite:
1. Being previously functional
2. Working in other contexts (confirmed in nightly build 2002032113)

Impact:
Disrupts workflow for users who:
- Keep bookmarks window persistently open
- Rely on keyboard shortcuts for window management

Technical Details:
- Regression introduced in recent builds (within past 2 weeks)
- Menu items missing but accelerator should still function
- Verified working in nightly builds (suggests fix exists)

User Context:
Power user workflow dependency - this shortcut is critical for users who:
1. Maintain open bookmarks as a "home base"
2. Launch most browser sessions from this window
